name: perrynet@salesforce-cli-server
description: Salesforce MCP Server v2.0 - Project-based Salesforce automation through CLI integration
long_description:
Enables AI assistants to execute Apex code, query Salesforce data, and manage org metadata using project-based Salesforce CLI integration. Works with any Salesforce DX project by leveraging local .sf configurations. Perfect for developers and administrators who want to automate Salesforce tasks through natural language interactions.

Requires: Valid Salesforce DX project directory with .sf/config.json
